backend/main.mo: Defines the actor with user profiles, networks, transmissions, authorization mixin, and query/update methods for managing profiles and signaling state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides a mapping of frontend file paths to short functional descriptions of each component or page.
frontend/docs/droidstar-settings-referen: Documents the replicated DroidStar behaviors for server lists, caching, UI population, and normalization without reverse engineering.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-23-prev: Promotion checklist for Version 23 detailing deployment-only constraints and pre-production verification steps.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-30-prev: Promotion checklist for Version 30 noting no code changes allowed and outlining attestation and verification steps.
frontend/docs/publish-preview-to-product: Runbook detailing the steps and verification checks required to promote the preview build to production without code or config changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining light/dark theme variables and base styling for the application.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the PTTStar app root, metadata, PWA settings, and main TSX bundle.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and display behavior for PTTStar.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page shown when the app cannot reach the network.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching, offline support, and network-first fetch logic with exclusions for identity and canister requests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router and layout logic including authentication flow, redirects, and page routing via TanStack Router.
frontend/src/auth/authClientStorage.ts: LocalStorage adapter for namespaced regenerated auth data plus utilities to clear stored auth state.
frontend/src/auth/iiAuthProvider.tsx: React provider managing Internet Identity authentication lifecycle, status tracking, login behavior, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches UI errors and displays a recovery screen with reset and session‑clear options.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main app layout providing header, navigation, footer, and auth‑aware navigation visibility.
Displays a segmented audio input level meter driven by a custom audio‑level hook.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedFlo: Error fallback UI for authenticated flows with retry and session‑clear actions.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Handles authentication and actor initialization, showing login prompts or fallback error states as needed.
frontend/src/components/AutoGatewayStatu: Shows inferred gateway auto‑configuration status and the detected preset type.
frontend/src/components/ColorAccentPanel: Simple wrapper for console‑style accent panels.
Console‑style page header with title, subtitle, and optional icon.
frontend/src/components/DigitalVoiceConn: Large form for configuring and saving Digital Voice connection settings with presets, validation, and auto‑loading.
frontend/src/components/DigitalVoiceSave: Displays saved Digital Voice connection details, shows missing field alerts, and provides masked credentials and gateway status.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryBrowser: Provides a searchable, filterable network directory with mode selection, favorites, and talkgroup selection handling.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchConne: Form for configuring IAX/DVSwitch connections with auto-prefill, validation, presets, and advanced settings.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchSaved: Shows saved IAX/DVSwitch configuration with masked sensitive fields and gateway status indicator.
frontend/src/components/InstallAppAction: Renders PWA install button and iOS installation instructions when applicable.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles login/logout actions, displays errors, and manages session clearing and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/NowHearingList.t: Displays recent radio transmissions with metadata, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/PersonalDirector: Manages user-created local network entries with add, delete, and persistence via localStorage.
frontend/src/components/PostLoginInterst: Shows a blocking sign‑in progress screen with a timeout that reveals retry and session-clearing options.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Presents a required profile setup form for callsign, name, and license acknowledgement and saves via backend.
frontend/src/components/PttControl.tsx: Provides a push‑to‑talk button handling press states and transmit callbacks with visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeStatusBa: Displays real-time connection, transmit, or receive status with contextual icons and styling.
frontend/src/components/TransmitDisclaim: Warns users that a license acknowledgement is required and links to settings to complete setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Initializes a backend actor with authentication and invalidates other queries when ready, exposing actor state and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioLevelMeter.ts: Tracks microphone audio levels in real time using Web Audio API, managing stream and cleanup automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and saves the caller's user profile via actor methods with react‑query caching and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Fetches favorite networks and toggles favorites through actor calls with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicPttRecorder.ts: Records microphone audio via MediaRecorder, handling permissions, errors, and returning a blob URL on completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworks.ts: Fetches builtin networks and provides client‑side search and filtering using actor data.
frontend/src/hooks/useNowHearing.ts: Retrieves and polls real‑time transmissions and allows recording new activity with automatic query refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferredConnectio: Manages saving, loading, and validating preferred connection settings with type guards and normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Manages PWA installability state, detects iOS/standalone mode, listens for install events, and exposes an install prompt function.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrzLookup.ts: Provides a mutation that calls the backend actor's qrzLookup method to fetch callsign data.
frontend/src/hooks/useRememberLoginPrefe: Stores and retrieves the user's 'remember login' preference in localStorage, defaulting to true.
Fetches, caches, and updates BrandMeister and AllStar server directory data with React Query and local fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Queries the backend for the caller's user role or admin status with retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRtcPtt.ts: Implements WebRTC push‑to‑talk logic, managing peer connection setup, audio streams, signaling, and transmission state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a radio‑console theme using OKLCH colors with custom utilities and components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutCompliancePage.t: Displays project information, purpose, and licensing requirements using styled cards and panels.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityPage.tsx: Shows live transmission activity with a refreshable Now Hearing list and page header UI.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Renders the connection setup page with tabs for IAX/DVSwitch and Digital Voice, handling presets, saved connections, and quick setup flow.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Provides a browser for networks and talkgroups, letting users pick a directory entry and navigate to PTT with the selected configuration.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the app landing page with an overview, requirements, and getting-started information for PTTStar.
frontend/src/pages/PttPage.tsx: Loads the active connection and manages WebRTC push‑to‑talk controls, audio levels, activity list, and auto-connect behaviors.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Allows users to edit their profile, license acknowledgement, login preference, and server directory sources, with save and refresh actions.
frontend/src/utils/connectionPresets.ts: Defines preset IDs, metadata, and helper functions for mapping presets to forms and retrieving preset lists.
frontend/src/utils/digitalVoiceGatewayCl: Implements a WebRTC signaling client over WebSocket for Digital Voice gateways, handling connection setup, join metadata, and message routing.
frontend/src/utils/gatewayUrlBootstrap.t: Extracts gateway-related URL parameters, stores them in sessionStorage, and infers connection presets like BrandMeister, TGIF, or AllStar.
frontend/src/utils/roomKey.ts: Derives stable room keys and human-readable labels based on normalized connection settings.
frontend/src/utils/serverAddress.ts: Provides server address normalization and equality checks for consistent comparison and storage.
Implements localStorage-backed caching for BrandMeister and AllStar server directories with TTL tracking.
Fetches and parses BrandMeister and AllStar server lists from remote sources with timeout and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/serverDirectorySource: Manages configurable GitHub URLs and metadata for server directory sources with persistence.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, spacing, and animations, plus plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing IAX/DVSwitch UI redesign goals, existing features, and pending feature requests such as phone-to-IAX mode and codec selection.
